general_advisory: Sow rice and wheat seeds in well-prepared fields. Ensure proper irrigation for higher yield. Take care of beef cattle during the rainy season.

advisory: Maintain proper water levels for rice cultivation.
Apply fertilizers as per soil nutrient requirements.
Ensure adequate soil moisture during wheat cultivation.
Protect wheat crop from pests and diseases.
Provide shelter for beef cattle during heavy rainfall.
Monitor cattle for any signs of diseases and take prompt action.
